title: Higher Ping in  evening times?
body:
Has anyone else noticed they get significantly higher ping in the evening? All throughout the day I have a constant 34-35 ping but when I get on at 9 PM (NZ time) My ping fluctuates anywhere from 55-70. Is this a Riot issue, or an issue on my end and how would I identify the problem/fix it?

ISP is Spark.
